metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37966 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
Windows Kerberos RC4-HMAC Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-37966` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ctdb - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libnss-winbind - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libpam-winbind - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libsmbclient - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libwbclient0 - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
python3-samba - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
registry-tools - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-ad-dc - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-ad-provision - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-common - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-common-bin - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-libs - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-testsuite - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
smbclient - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
winbind - 2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
ldb-tools - 2:2.6.1+samba4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
libldb2 - 2:2.6.1+samba4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
python3-ldb - 2:2.6.1+samba4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: samba package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
samba package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.17.5+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
